alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Suffolk County through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dix Hills, or near Huntington Station, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brentwood, Commack, Huntington Station, Centereach, Deer Park, Medford, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Huntington, Stony Brook, Port Jefferson, Northport, Coram, Holbrook and Dix Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern New York.
